title: Nursing Practice Competency Strengthening: Interaction and Failure Response Strategy Design in Human-Autonomy Teams

context.prior_knowledge: Basic team collaboration experience and understanding of automated systems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and classify three types of failures (automation failures, autonomy errors, cyberattacks) occurring in a Human-Autonomy Team (HAT) environment.
Learners can analyze communication patterns and coordination strategies among team members through simulation-based experiments and suggest improvement plans.
Learners can understand the impact of a leading role (e.g., pilot) on other members' behaviors within a team and apply effective leadership strategies in failure situations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
